Detailed Description

Reply packet with the start node of a traffic queue.

If the nextMapID is not MAX_UINT32 the nodeID is the ID of the node to continue the search on on the next map.

void QueueStartReplyPacket::setDistance (  uint32  passedDistance  ) 
 

Set the distance that have been covered on this map.

This might be less than the requested distance if the queue leavs the map or if we have to give up.

Parameters:
passedDistance Distance searched.

The ID of the next map to continue on.
